messages.content: Organize our downloaded tools like ffdec into the tools directory. Keep the working latest versions and delete the others. Update documentation as needed.

Successfully organized FFDec tools and documentation. Moved working FFDec v19.1.0 installation to tools/ffdec/, removed duplicate ZIP files, created comprehensive tools documentation, and updated main project README with tools section.

keyAchievements: ✅ Moved working FFDec v19.1.0 to tools/ffdec/ directory
✅ Removed duplicate ZIP files (ffdec.zip, ffdec_new.zip, ffdec_latest.zip)
✅ Updated main README.md with tools section
nextSteps: Tools are properly organized and documented
FFDec ready for Flash Experiments development

technicalContext.fileStructure: Centralized tools/ directory with proper versioning
technicalContext.documentation: Complete usage guides, troubleshooting, and integration info
technicalContext.platforms: Cross-platform support (Windows exe, Java jar, shell scripts)
